alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Gadsden; Jefferson; Leon; Liberty; Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Watch issued January 27 at 4:36PM EST until January 27 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: TORNADO WATCH 12 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN FLORIDA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 6 COUNTIES IN BIG BEND FLORIDA FRANKLIN GADSDEN JEFFERSON LEON LIBERTY WAKULLA IN GEORGIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 7 COUNTIES IN SOUTH CENTRAL GEORGIA THOMAS IN SOUTHWEST GEORGIA BAKER DECATUR GRADY MILLER MITCHELL SEMINOLE THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ALMA, APALACHICOLA, AUSMAC, BABCOCK, BAINBRIDGE, BAY CITY, BEACHTON, BELLVIEW, BETHEL, BEVERLY, BOYKIN, BRADFORDVILLE, BRANCHVILLE, BUCK SIDING, CAIRO, CAMILLA, CAPEL, CAPITOLA, CAPPS, CARRABELLE, CASA BLANCO, CHAIRES, CHAIRES CROSSROADS, CHATTAHOOCHEE, COLQUITT, COOKTOWN, COTTON, DAVIS PARK, DECATUR CO A/P, DILLON, DILLS, DONALDSONVILLE A/P, DONALSONVILLE, DRIFTON, ELMODEL WMA, ELPINO, ENTERPRISE, FAIRCHILD, FESTUS, FORT GADSDEN, GRADY CO A/P, HANOVER, HARDIN HEIGHTS, HAWKINSTOWN, HILLIARDVILLE, HOGGARD MILL, IVEYS MILL, JARROTT, KILLEARN ESTATES, KILLEARN LAKES, LITTLE HOPE, LITTMAN, LYNN, MACLAY STATE GARDENS, MAYHAW, METCALF, MILFORD, MITCHELL CO A/P, MONCRIEF, MONTICELLO, NEWTON, PASCO, PELHAM, PINE PARK, QUINCY, QUINCY AIRPORT, RED STORE CROSSROADS, RIVERTURN, SANTA CLARA, SEMINOLE STATE PARK, SOPCHOPPY, ST. MARKS, STEINHAM STORE, SWEETWATER, TALLAHASSEE, THOMASVILLE, TILTON, WAKULLA SPRINGS, WEST BAINBRIDGE, AND WETUMPKA.
